name: Lavasa
description: Lavasa is famous for its engaging and exciting water activities.

reviews.reviewText: We went with our kids, had a fun day in the waters.
Went during peak season. Wasn't worth the hype.
Too much crowd. I hate this place.

name: Alleppey Backwater Cruise
description: It's best known for houseboat cruises along the rustic Kerala backwaters, a network of tranquil canals and lagoons.

reviews.reviewText: Contact Mr Chidambaram +91-9765638900 for reasonable package. They catch the best fish.
Go during december, the evenings are so pleasant here.
